name: Conjure Device
description: Conjures a nonmagical device.

name: Lesser Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv2 or below mage spell.

name: Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv7 or below mage spell.

name: Greater Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv13 or below mage spell.

name: Master Conjure Magical Device
description: Conjure a magical device that is either magically powered and/or utilizes a lv17 or below mage spell.

name: Lesser Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure made of either wood or iron that is up to 25sqft and 1 floor.

name: Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure made of wood, iron, and stone. The structure may have basic electrical components, 500sqrt, and be up to 3 stories tall.

name: Greater Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure that is made from any non-magical material, has electricity, 10000sqft, and up to 10 stories tall.

name: Master Conjure Structure
description: Conjure a structure that is made from any non-magical material, has electricity, 25000sqft, and up to 50 stories tall.

name: Lesser Conjure Vehicle
description: Conjure a simple vehicle made of wood and iron, no bugger than an Oregon trail wagon.

name: Conjure Vehicle
description: Conjure an electric, non-programmable, vehicle made from any non-magical material.

name: Greater Conjure Vehicle
description: Conjure a high-tech vehicle.

name: Lesser Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 3.

name: Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 7.

name: Greater Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 11.

name: Master Summon Modron
description: Summon an intelligent robotic being to fight for you. This Modron will be around level 15.

name: Lesser Summon Lawful Being
description: Summons a lawful being that will aid you in construction. The lawful being is able to create lesser devices.

name: Summon Lawful Being
description: Summons a lawful being that will aid you in construction. The lawful being is able to create devices.

name: Greater Summon Lawful Being
description: Summons a lawful being that will aid you in construction. The lawful being is able to create greater devices.

name: Summon Grey
description: Summons a grey minion that can command up to 5 groups of 32 minions. This minion has the same stats as a brown. If a grey dies, the minions under its command will route for one round.

name: Summon Black
description: Summons a black minion that has the abilities of a level 10 overlord. hp 8d12 apr 3 mana 45 thac0 10 ac 0 str 14 con 5 dex 15 wis 15 int 10 cha 1. If a black dies, the minions under its command will route for one round. All overlord skills from a black are superior and they can use all weapons.

name: Summon Brown
description: Summons a brown minion to fight for you. This minion can use a single weapon but not armor. hp 1, apr 1, thac0 18, ac 8, str 10, con 5, dex 10, wis 5, int 5, cha 1.

name: Summon Blue
description: Summons a blue minion that you heal a target for 1d4 health on touch. hp 1, apr 1, thac0 20, ac 10, str 5, con 5, dex 5, wis 10, int 10, cha 1.

name: Summon Red
description: Summons a red minion that can cast flame. Has the same stats as a blue minion.

name: Summon Green
description: Summons a green minion that can use all rogue skills at 25%. Has the same stats as a brown.

name: Alter Minion
description: Phyically change a minion giving them new attributes. This does not include direct stat or health changes. Examples include horns, scales, or claws. The effects of these changes are determined by the DM.

name: Mutate Minion
description: Randomly mutate a minion changing its physical attributes, stats, or looks entirely.

name: Explode Minion
description: Detonates a minion damaging everything in the area.

name: Clone Minion
description: Creates a copy of a target minion under your control.

name: Summon White
description: Summons a white minion that can be imbued with a spell. This minion has the same stats as a blue.

name: Imbue Spell
description: Grant a white minion the ability to use a spell. Imbue Spell can be overridden by casting it again with a different spell. Similar to weapon proficiency, Imbue Spell works with a single spell from the mage skill sheet, changing the name to Imbue (Selected Spell). For example, if an overlord wants to imbue a minion with toxic dart, they would take the spell Imbue Toxic Dart. The cost of Imbue Spell is the cost of the spell being imbued. When a white minion is imbued with a spell, their color changes to match the essence of that spell.

name: Enlighten Minion
description: Perminantly increase the wisdom and intelligence of a minion by 1 and decrease the strength and dexterity of a minion by 1.

name: Strengthen Minion
description: Perminantly increase a minion's strength by 1 and decrease wisdom, intelligence, and thac0 by 1.

name: Condition Minion
description: Perminantly increase a minion's con by 1 and decrease ac, wisdom, and intelligence by 1.

name: Quicken Minion
description: Perminantly increase the dexterity and apr of a minion by 1 and decrease the wisdom and intelligence of a minion by 1.

name: Infuse Soul
description: Infuse the captured soul of a creature into a minion, giving it some of the abilities of the creature.

name: Druidcraft
description: Create a harmless natural effect. For example, create a tiny snow globe like effect that predicts the weather at that location for the next day, instantly make a flower bloom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom, or instantly snuff out a small fire.

name: Feral Claws
description: Grow claws on your fists increasing your unarmed melee damage by 1d4.

name: Feral Jaws
description: Grow serrated teath and increase your jaw strength increasing your bite damage by 1d8.

name: Purify Food and Drink
description: Remove all poison effects from food or drink that you touch.

name: Speak with Animals
description: Allows you to verbally communicate with animals even if their intelligence is below 7.

name: Speak with Monsters
description: Allows you to verbally communicate with monsters even if their intelligence is below 7.

name: Animal Messenger
description: Speak through an animal that is charmed or allied to you.

name: Beast Sense
description: See and hear through a charmed or allied beast's eyes and ears.

name: Lesser Locate Animal
description: Locate a specified type of animal within 1 mile of your location.

name: Lesser Locate Monster
description: Locate a specified type of monster within 1 mile of your location.

name: Lesser Locate Dragon
description: Locate a specified type of dragon within 1 mile of your location.

name: Lesser Locate Plant
description: Locate a specified type of plant within 1 mile of your location.

name: Locate Animal
description: Locate a specified type of animal within 50 miles of your location.

name: Locate Monster
description: Locate a specified type of monster within 50 miles of your location.

name: Locate Dragon
description: Locate a specified type of dragon within 50 miles of your location.

name: Locate Plant
description: Locate a specified type of plant within 50 miles of your location.

name: Greater Locate Animal
description: Locate a specified type of animal anywhere within your dimension.

name: Greater Locate Monster
description: Locate a specified type of monster anywhere within your dimension.

name: Greater Locate Dragon
description: Locate a specified type of dragon anywhere within your dimension.

name: Greater Locate Plant
description: Locate a specified type of plant anywhere within your dimension.

name: Master Locate Animal
description: Locate a specified type of animal anywhere in the multiverse.

name: Master Locate Monster
description: Locate a specified type of monster anywhere in the multiverse.

name: Master Locate Dragon
description: Locate a specified type of dragon anywhere in the multiverse.

name: Master Locate Plant
description: Locate a specified type of plant anywhere in the multiverse.

name: Speak with Dragons
description: Allows you to speak dragon tongue.

name: Speak with Plants
description: Allows you to speak with plants.

name: Heros' Feast
description: Summon a great feast which can feed up to 12 people. Those who partake in the feast are cured of all diseases and poison, become resistant to poison and horror for the next 8hrs, and have advantage on wisdom saving throws. They also gain 2d10 maximum health for 24hrs.

name: Revivify
description: Revive a creature who has been dead for less than 10 seconds.

name: Revive
description: Revive a creature who has been dead for less than 1 week.

name: Mass Revive
description: Revive a group of creatures who have been dead for less than 1 week.

name: Lesser Transport via Plants
description: Teleport between two large plants that are within 1 mile of each other.

name: Transport via Plants
description: Teleport between two large plants that are in the same universe.

name: Greater Transport via Plants
description: Teleport between two large plants anywhere in the multiverse.

name: Familiar
description: Make an allied creature your familiar. This creature may not be a person.

name: Familiar Perminancy
description: Make a temporary effect on a familiar perminant including transformations and stat increases. Stat increases of the same type override each other.

name: Summon Small Animal
description: Summons a small animal under your control. You may specify an animal with no dimension larger than 2ft or a random animal will be summoned.

name: Summon Animal
description: Summons an animal under your control. You may specify an animal with no dimension larger than 4ft or a random animal will be summoned.

name: Summon Large Animal
description: Summons a large animal under your control. You may specify any non-magical animal or a random animal will be summoned.

name: Animal Ability
description: Gain an attribute or ability of a beast that you have seen or know of. This ability must be obtainable below your level.

name: Plant Ability
description: Gain an attribute or ability of a plant that you have seen or know of. This ability must be obtainable below your level.

name: Monster Ability
description: Gain an attribute or ability of a monster that you have seen or know of. This ability must be obtainable below your level.

name: Dragon Ability
description: Gain an attribute or ability of a dragon that you have seen or know of. This ability must be obtainable below your level.

name: Animal Shape
description: Shapeshift into an animal that you have seen or know of. This creature must be under your level.

name: Plant Shape
description: Shapeshift into a plant that you have seen or know of. This creature must be under your level.

name: Monster Shape
description: Shapeshift into a monster that you have seen or know of. This creature must be under your level.

name: Draconic Shape
description: Shapeshift into an animal that you have seen or know of. This creature must be under your level.

name: Lesser Summon Plant
description: Summon a small non-magical plant that has no dimension larger than 1ft. You must have seen this plant before or read about it.

name: Summon Plant
description: Summon a non-magical plant that has no dimension larger than 5ft. You must have seen this plant before or read about it.

name: Greater Summon Plant
description: Summon any plant that has no dimension larger than 25ft. You must have seen this plant before or read about it.

name: Master Summon Plant
description: Summon any plant that you have seen or read of.

name: Lesser Summon Monster
description: Summon a monster that is level 2 or below. Improving this spell increases the level cap by 1.

name: Summon Monster
description: Summon a monster that is level 7 or below. Improving this spell increases the level cap by 1.

name: Greater Summon Monster
description: Summon a monster that is level 12 or below. Improving this spell increases the level cap by 1.

name: Master Summon Monster
description: Summon a monster that is your level or below. Improving this spell increases the level cap by 1.

name: Lesser Summon Dragon
description: Summon a very young dragon of any element. hp 15d8 + 60. str 21 dex 10 con 19 int 13 wis 11 cha 17 thac0 13 ac 3.

name: Summon Dragon
description: Summon a juvenile dragon of any element. hp 18d10 + 108 str 24 dex 10 con 22 int 15 wis 11 cha 20 thac0 10 ac 0.

name: Greater Summon Dragon
description: Summon an adult dragon of any element. hp 19d12 + 133. str 27 dex 10 con 25 int 16 wis 13 cha 21 thac0 7 ac -3.

name: Master Summon Dragon
description: Summon an old dragon of any element. hp 25d12 + 177. str 30 dex 10 con 27 int 17 wis 14 cha 22 thac0 5 ac -5.

name: Flame

name: Scorching Wave

name: Fireball

name: Inferno Lance

name: Fire Storm

name: Water Jet

name: Aqua Lance

name: Maelstrom

name: Tsunami Wrath

name: Rock Fist

name: Earth Shatter

name: Obsidian Spear

name: Meteor Slam

name: Vine Whip

name: Bramble Shot

name: Toxic Bloom

name: Thorn Surge

name: Tempest Fangs

name: Stormfront

name: Static Shock

name: Stormstrike

name: Echo Slam

name: Sonic Boom

name: Thunder God's Wrath

name: Frost Blast

name: Frost Shard

name: Snow Spike

name: Freezing Ray

name: Glacial Grasp

name: Absolute Zero

name: Acid Splash

name: Corrode Beam

name: Acid Rain

name: Melting Touch

name: Caustic Torrent

name: Disintegration Pool
description: A massive pool of acid dissolves flesh and metal.

name: Venom Sting

name: Toxic Dart

name: Cloud of Spores
description: A choking poisonous cloud fills an area.

name: Snakebite Curse
description: Twin strikes deliver potent venom.

name: Neurotoxin Wave

name: Plague Burst

name: Death Touch

name: Grave Bolt
description: A bolt of shadow pierces the soul.

name: Soul Drain

name: Bone Shard
description: Deadly bone fragments erupt from the ground.

name: Wail of the Forgotten

name: Black Sun

name: Light Spark

name: Radiant Ray

name: Solar Lance

name: Blinding Nova
description: A flash of light blinds and burns foes.

name: Dancing Lights

name: Illuminate

name: Darken

name: Darkness
description: Fill a room with darkness, consuming any natural light in it.

name: Dark Veil
description: Cover a square mile in complete darkness.

name: Lesser Alert
description: Become alerted when an unwanted person or creature enters an area with a 10ft radius. The alert can be auditory or telepathic but you must be within 1 mile to hear it.

name: Alert
description: Become alerted when an unwanted person or creature enters an area with a 1 mile radius. The alert can be auditory or telepathic but you must be in the same universe to hear it.

name: Greater Alert
description: Become alerted when an unwanted person or creature enters any defined area within a universe or the universe itself. The alert can be auditory or telepathic.

name: Lesser Conceal Movement
description: Hide your movements from people and creatures, making it harder for them to detect you. Avoid alert spells if your concealment is stronger than the alert.

name: Conceal Movement
description: Hide your movements from people and creatures, making it harder for them to detect you. Avoid alert spells if your concealment is stronger than the alert.

name: Greater Conceal Movement
description: Hide your movements from people and creatures, making it harder for them to detect you. Avoid alert spells if your concealment is stronger than the alert.

name: Comprehend Language
description: You or a target become able to understand a language of your chosing.

name: Speak Language
description: You or a target become able to speak a language of your chosing.

name: Lesser Conceal Magic
description: Hide if something is magical from lesser detect magic. Whichever spell is more powerful determines if the magic is detected or not.

name: Conceal Magic
description: Hide if something is magical from detect magic. Whichever spell is more powerful determines if the magic is detected or not.

name: Greater Conceal Magic
description: Hide if something is magical from greater detect magic. Whichever spell is more powerful determines if the magic is detected or not.

name: Master Conceal Magic
description: Hide if something is magical from master detect magic. Whichever spell is more powerful determines if the magic is detected or not.

name: Lesser Detect Magoc
description: Detect if an item is magical.

name: Detect Magoc
description: Detect if an item is magical.

name: Greater Detect Magoc
description: Detect if an item is magical.

description: Detect if an item is magical.

name: Conceal Motive
description: Hide your motive from those using detect motive magically.

name: Greater Conceal Motive
description: Hide your motive from those using detect motive magically.

name: Greater Detect Motive
description: Detect someone's motive during a conversation.

name: Master Detect Motive
description: Detect someone's motive during a conversation.

name: Lesser Detect Trap
description: Detect a nearby trap alerting you to its presence but not identifying what it is.

name: Detect Trap
description: Detect a nearby trap alerting you to its presence but not identifying what it is.

name: Greater Detect Trap
description: Detect a nearby trap alerting you to its presence but not identifying what it is.

name: Master Detect Trap
description: Detect a nearby trap alerting you to its presence but not identifying what it is.

name: Lesser Conceal Trap
description: Hide a trap from magical detect trap and reduce detect trap rogue skills by 1%.

name: Conceal Trap
description: Hide a trap from magical detect trap and reduce detect trap rogue skills by 2%.

name: Greater Conceal Trap
description: Hide a trap from magical detect trap and reduce detect trap rogue skills by 3%.

name: Master Conceal Trap

name: Lesser Sense Emotion
description: Sense a person or creature's emotions within a sort distance.

name: Sense Emotion
description: Sense a person or creature's emotions.

name: Greater Sense Emotion
description: Sense a person or creature's emotions.

name: Master Sense Emotion
description: Sense a person or creature's emotions.

name: Lesser Conceal Emotion
description: Hide your emotions from someone casting the spell sense emotion.

name: Conceal Emotion
description: Hide your emotions from someone casting the spell sense emotion.

name: Greater Conceal Emotion
description: Hide your emotions from someone casting the spell sense emotion.

name: Master Conceal Emotion
description: Hide your emotions from someone casting the spell sense emotion.

name: Grease
description: Creates a 10ft puddle of grease. Any creatures on the grease must make a dexterity roll or they fall.

name: Glue
description: Creates a 10ft puddle of glue. Any creatures on the glue must make a strength roll or they immobilized.

name: Feather Fall
description: Slows the rate of fall of a target. Target takes no fall damage.

name: Levitate
description: Levitate yourself or an object under 500lbs up to 20ft.

name: Fly
description: Allows the target to fly at 30mph for 10 minutes.

name: Grounding
description: Prevent flight within a 1 mile radius.

name: Haste
description: Target gains advantage on dexterity rolls and an additional non-magical attack.

name: Fog Cloud
description: Creates a 20ft cloud of semi-opaque fog.

name: Smoke Screen
description: Creates a 100ft long wall of opaque smoke that rises 15ft from the ground.

name: Smoke Storm
description: Conjure a storm of smoke that is half a mile in radius.

name: Lesser Identify Magical Item
description: Identifies what a magical item does. You must know that the item has magical properties before using this spell.

name: Identify Magical Item
description: Identifies what a magical item does. You must know that the item has magical properties before using this spell.

name: Greater Identify Magical Item
description: Identifies what a magical item does. You must know that the item has magical properties before using this spell.

name: Lesser Hide Magical Item
description: Hides the properties of a magical item from the spell identify magical item and reduces intelligence by 1 when using the skill identify magical item.

name: Hide Magical Item
description: Hides the properties of a magical item from the spell identify magical item and reduces intelligence by 2 when using the skill identify magical item.

name: Greater Hide Magical Item
description: Hides the properties of a magical item from the spell identify magical item and reduces intelligence by 3 when using the skill identify magical item.

name: Suggestion
description: Makes a target complete a non-harmful action. Target makes. wisdom saving throw.

name: Charm Person
description: Attempt to charm a humanoid target. Target must make a wisdom saving roll to avoid the charm. If it is in combat, the monster gains advantage on its roll. Charm is broken if you or your companions harm the monster.

name: Charm Monster
description: The targeted monster must make a wisdom roll or becomes charmed by the caster. If it is in combat, the monster gains advantage on its roll. Charm is broken if you or your companions harm the monster.

name: Dominate Person
description: Allows you to completely take over the mind of a person. The targeted person may make a wisdom saving throw and has advantage if it is being attacked. You may issue commands to the person without using an action. You make take full control over the person and act for them instead of yourself. If the person takes damage, they make a wisdom saving throw to break out of the domination.

name: Dominate Monster
description: Allows you to control a monster. The monster may make a wisdom saving throw to prevent being dominated. When dominated you can instruct the monster or take over their mind acting as them instead of yourself. Each time the monster takes damage it may make a wisdom roll to break out of the domination.

name: Lesser Arcane Lock
description: Conjure a magical lock on a door or container.

name: Arcane Lock
description: Conjure a magical lock on a door or container. Reduces rogue pick lock skill by 1%.

name: Greater Arcane Lock
description: Conjure a magical lock on a door or container. Reduces rogue pick lock skill by 2%.

name: Master Arcane Lock
description: Conjure a magical lock on a door or container. Reduces rogue pick lock skill by 3%.

name: Lesser Pick Lock
description: Unlock an arcane lock if this spell is more powerful than the enchantment or take a 1% chance to unlock a non-magical lock.

name: Pick Lock
description: Unlock an arcane lock if this spell is more powerful than the enchantment or take a 2% chance to unlock a non-magical lock.

name: Greater Pick Lock
description: Unlock an arcane lock if this spell is more powerful than the enchantment or take a 3% chance to unlock a non-magical lock.

name: Master Pick Lock
description: Unlock an arcane lock if this spell is more powerful than the enchantment or take a 4% chance to unlock a non-magical lock.

name: Lesser Invisibility

name: Invisibility
description: Become invisible.

name: Greater Invisibility
description: Become invisible.

name: Master Invisibility
description: Become invisible.

description: See through weaker invisibility and illusion spells.

name: Master True Sight
description: See through weaker invisibility and illusion spells.

name: Lesser Heal

name: Heal

name: Greater Heal
description: Heal yourself or another player for 2d20 health.

name: Master Heal

name: Darkvision
description: Allows the target to see in the dark.

name: Augury
description: Reveals the result of a given action. Can either be weal (good), woe (bad), weal and woe, or nothing.

name: Divination
description: Ask the DM a question relating to a specific goal or event, the DM responds truthfully in any way that they want. After casting this spell twice in one day, there is a cumulative 25% chance that the DM gives a random reading instead of the truth.

name: Lesser Locate Object
description: Locate an object that you own within 1 mile of your position.

name: Locate Object

name: Greater Locate Object

name: Air Bubble

name: Water Breathing

name: Breathless

name: Water Walking

name: Stride

name: Slowness

name: Gate Seal

name: Blink

name: Teleport

name: Mass Teleport

name: Plane Shift

name: Lesser Sense Life

name: Sense Life

name: Greater Sense Life

name: Master Sense Life
description: Detect life within a 1 mile radius.

name: Lesser Feign Death
description: A willing target is put into a state indistinguishable from death for up to an hour. Hides from weaker sense life spells.

name: Feign Death
description: A willing target is put into a state indistinguishable from death for up to an hour. Hides from weaker sense life spells.

name: Greater Feign Death
description: A willing target is put into a state indistinguishable from death for up to an hour. Hides from weaker sense life spells.

name: Master Feign Death
description: A willing target is put into a state indistinguishable from death for up to an hour. Hides from weaker sense life spells.

name: Lesser Illusion
description: Conjure an illusion the size of your palm. The illusion can produce sound and small amounts of light.

name: Illusion
description: Conjure an illusion the size a room. The illusion can produce sound and small amounts of light.

name: Greater Illusion
description: Conjure an illusion the size of a large building. The illusion can produce sound and small amounts of light.

name: Master Illusion
description: Conjure an illusion that fits within a 1 mile radius. The illusion can produce sound and small amounts of light.

name: Dispel
description: Dispels a lingering magical spell. You will be informed on the cost of the spell. The price of dispelling is doubled for each improvement the spell caster has on the base spell.

name: Disjunct
description: Removes all enchantments from non-artifact items.

name: Counter Disjunct
description: Prevents an item from being disjuncted.

name: Antimagic Field
description: Creates an 10ft spherical volume around you where magic does not exist. No spells can enter or be cast and magic items are rendered mundane.

name: Banishment
description: Temporarily banish the target to its home plane. Target may make either a charisma or wisdom saving throw to prevent banishment.

name: Empower Skill
description: Temporarily Improves a skill that a creature knows. Ex. Superior -> Epic. Lasts for 1 hour.

name: Forbid Skill
description: Temporarily Weaken a skill that a creature knows. Ex. Superior -> Improved. Lasts for 1 hour.

name: Mage Hand
description: Lift an item within 30ft using a magical hand. Rolls to lift items with mage hand require strength.

name: Lesser Telekinesis
description: Lift an item under 100lbs.

name: Lesser Telepathy
description: Communicate telepathically with a willing creature for up to 1 hour.

name: Scrying
description: You can see and hear a creature on the same plane as you. The target can make a wisdom saving throw to prevent scrying. Modifier for saving throw: +5 if you've heard of the target, +0 if you've met the target, -5 if you know the target well.

name: Astral Projection
description: Create a spectral clone of yourself and up to 8 others in the astral plane that is tethered to your physical body. If you enter any other plane of existence your physical body is teleported to your astral projection. If the tether is broken you insanity die.

name: Confuse
description: Roll a d10 the target does one of the following actions according to what is rolled: 1 the target moves in a random direction, 2-6 the target doesn't move or take actions, 7-8 the target must melee during its next action, or 9-10 the spell has no effect on the target. The target may make a wisdom saving throw to prevent confusion.

name: Irresistible Dance
description: Causes your target to dance preventing them from doing other actions. Your target can make. wisdom saving throw to stop dancing.

name: Globe of Invulnerability
description: An immobile and impenetrable globe with a 10ft radius is created around you. Lasts up to 1 minute or until it is dispelled.

name: Scatter
description: Teleport up to 5 creatures to a random place 120ft away from you. Targets may make a wisdom roll to prevent being teleported.

name: Power Word Pain
description: Causes a target under 100 health to suffer severe pain. While in pain the target has disadvantage on all rolls. The target may make a constitution saving throw to remove the effects.

name: Power Word Stun
description: Prevents a target under 150 health from making actions. The target may make a constitution roll every turn to break out of stun.

name: Power Word Kill
description: Instantly kill a target under 100 health.

name: Etheralness
description: You gain the properties of a ghost, become invisible, and can walk through solid objects.

name: Chromatic Orb
description: Fires an orb of either acid, ice, fire, lightning, earth, or poison.

name: Prismatic Spray
description: Roll a d8 and do the corresponding action. 1 red - target takes 10d6 fire damage. 2 orange - target takes 10d6 acid damage. 3 yellow - target takes 10d6 lightning damage. 4 green - target takes 10d6 poison damage. 5 blue - target takes 10d6 cold damage. 6 indigo - target makes 3 constitution saving throws, if it fails all three it is turned to stone. 7 violet - target makes a wisdom saving throw, if it fails target becomes blind until your next turn. 8 - reroll twice and do both actions.

name: Reverse Gravity
description: Reverse gravity in a 50ft area. Creatures inside may make a dexterity saving throw to grab onto a fixed object.

name: Control Weather
description: Control the weather up to heavy rain and wind within a 5 mile area.

name: Meteor Swarm
description: Meteors rain from the sky in a 40ft area dealing fire damage to anyone inside.

name: Foresight
description: Allows the target to see slightly into the future. This target gains advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

name: Wish
description: You may wish for one of the following: an item worth up to 1,000,000mp and no more than 300ft in any direction, allow up to 20 creatures to regain all health, grant up to 10 creatures resistance to any element for a day, grant up to 10 creatures immunity to a spell or magical effect for a day, force a reroll for any event that happened in the past day. This spell can only be cast once a week. Cannot be greater spell focused.

name: Fortify Strength
description: Increases a target's or your strength by 1 for 1 hour.

name: Drain Strength
description: Decreses a target's or your strength by 1 for 1 hour.

name: Strength Fortress
description: Increases a target's or your strength by 1 when rolling saving throws for 1 hour.

name: Unstable Strength
description: Decreses a target's or your strength by 1 when rolling saving throws for 1 hour.

name: Drain Dexterity

name: Unstable Dexterity

name: Lesser Fortify Health
description: Increases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 1d4.

name: Lesser Drain Health
description: Decreases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 1d4.

name: Fortify Health
description: Increases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 10d4.

name: Drain Health
description: Decreases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 3d4.

name: Greater Fortify Health
description: Increases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 100d4.

name: Greater Drain Health
description: Decreases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 25d4.

name: Master Fortify Health
description: Increases the maximum health of yourself or a target by 1000d4.

name: Master Drain Health

name: Fortify Touch
description: Increases a target's or your touch for 1 hour, adding 1 to any roll when using that sense.

name: Drain Touch
description: Decreases a target's or your touch for 1 hour, reducing 1 from any roll when using that sense.

name: Fortify Sight
description: Increases a target's or your sight for 1 hour, adding 1 to any roll when using that sense.

name: Drain Sight
description: Decreases a target's or your sight for 1 hour, reducing 1 from any roll when using that sense.

name: Fortify Smell
description: Increases a target's or your smell for 1 hour, adding 1 to any roll when using that sense.

name: Drain Smell

name: Fortify Taste

name: Drain Taste

name: Fortify Hearing

name: Drain Hearing
description: Decreases a target's or your hearing for 1 hour, reducing 1 from any roll when using that sense.

name: Control fire
description: Control up to 10 cubic feet of fire up to 100ft away.

name: Greater Control fire

name: Master Control fire

name: Resist Fire
description: Your target takes half damage from fire for 1 hour. Improving this spell only increases the number of targets you can choose.

name: Weaken Fire
description: Your target takes double damage from fire for 1 hour. Improving this spell only increases the number of targets you can choose.

name: Resist Water

name: Weaken Water
description: Your target takes double damage from water for 1 hour. Improving this spell only increases the number of targets you can choose.

name: Weaken Necrotic

name: Weaken Radiant
